trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Findlay
There were no other sightings in Findlay on or around April 23rd 2013
Summary: 3 orange lights shaped like a triangle
divs: Sighting DetailsI was standing outside looking at the sky because there was supposed to be a meteor shower. I saw 3 bright lights that made a triangle come out of nowhere moving quickly from east to west. I saw it stop and hover above My yard I freaked out and ran inside and woke up My Husband. By the time I got Him outside it was gone.
